text:
Hi all - The following article suggests that you can now use language specific TLDs instead of sub-folders to host multi-lingual content on HubSpot - and without incurring the additional brand domains cost. Can anyone confirm?

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-do-i-manage-domains-for-multilingual-sites-on-HubSpot#domains>
This has now been confirmed as correct, for anyone that is interested.
